name: Paper Boss Free
description: No matter where are you? If you are getting bored! And finding out something to kill your time? The best time killer game is here to entertain you, just toss the paper and be the paper boss. Paper Boss is a simple and easy game but it is also a tough and challenging game at the same time. There are unlimited paper balls, just start throwing them into dustbin and kill your time. There is also a fan that blows air in both directions. Before throwing ball you have to precisely analyze wind speed and turning point. The game area is set in four different places for changing your mood and joy; choose your favorite place to play, each place has three difficulty levels easy, medium and hard. Stunning graphics and animations have been created to, improve your gaming experience, and make you sticky for hours.
